Package generation

Class BSPLeaf

java.lang.Object
generation.BSPNode
generation.BSPLeaf
public class BSPLeaf extends BSPNode
A leaf node for a tree of BSPNodes. It carries a list of walls. This code is refactored code from Maze.java by Paul Falstad, www.falstad.com, Copyright (C) 1998, all rights reserved Paul Falstad granted permission to modify and use code for teaching purposes. Refactored by Peter Kemper

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    BSPLeaf​(List<Wall> walls)
    Constructor stores reference to given list of walls and updates bounds

    • store

      public int store​(Document doc, Element mazeXML, int number)
      Store the content of a leaf node, in particular its list of walls. All entries carry the number of the node as an index and each wall has an additional second index for the wall number.
      Overrides:
      store in class BSPNode
      Parameters:
      doc - document to add data to
      mazeXML - element to add data to
      number - is an index number for this node in the XML format
      Returns:
      the highest used index number, in this case the given number

    • getAllWalls

      public List<Wall> getAllWalls()
      Returns:
      the list of walls
